author: JENNIFER PELTZ and ANTHONY IZAGUIRRE / AP
title: Daily New York COVID-19 Deaths Under 550 for First Time Since April 1: Governor
description: The daily increase in coronavirus deaths in New York state has dropped under 550 for the first time in over two weeks.
content: NEW YORK — The daily increase in coronavirus deaths in New York state has dropped under 550 for the first time in over two weeks as hospitalizations continue to decline, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Saturday, while warning that the crisis is far from over: Hospital… [+1308 chars]
